Docs.summary: Provides the title of an object list in an object list field. For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see the [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) Web site.

remarks.format: ## Remarks This class is used internally by an object list to create autogenerated fields.

Docs.permission: for operating in a hosted environment. Demand value: ; Permission value: .

remarks.format: ## Remarks Constructs a new <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectListTitleAttribute> object, initializing the <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectListTitleAttribute.Title%2A> property with the value of the `title` parameter.

Docs.summary: Gets or sets the title of the specified field. This API is obsolete. For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see the [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) Web site.
Docs.value: The title of the specified field. The default is an empty string ("").
